ActAeronautics Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canadian Aviation Regulations (Parts I and III â€” Airport Winter Maintenance)
PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADIAN AVIATION REGULATIONS (PARTS I AND III - AIRPORT WINTER MAINTENANCE) in order to (1) standardize winter maintenance operations at airports so that there is a minimum safety standard for all airports; and (2) ensure reliable and timely information is available to air operators and flight crews when making take-off and landing decisions at airports during the winter months.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2019-0118 Publication Date: 2019-05-15
